snippet.title: Alien Shooter (2003) HD | Gameplay
snippet.description:
40+ min. of gameplay from the old classic, Alien Shooter. It was released 2003. Enjoy!

Alien Shooter is a 3D Isometric action-RPG shooter game for PC developed by Sigma Team. It combines elements of arcade action and RPG games.

Even more gameplay videos at my best friends McAkomx: http://www.youtube.com/user/McAkomx

Played, recorded (with FRAPS) and transcoded (with VirtualDub) by http://www.donsalva.com !

Played on:
CPU: Q6600 @ 3GHZ, 8×375 @ 58 °C Load
MoBo: P5B Deluxe/WiFi-AP Bios Rev. 1236
RAM: 4GB A-Data Vitesta Ext. Edt. 800Mhz@833Mhz
GPU: PowerColor HD4870 1GB
HDD: 2 x Maxtor 6B200M0 (200GB) & 1 x Samsung HD501LJ (500 GB)
TFT: 27" Iiyama ProLite E2710HDSD
OS: Windows 7 Ultimate 32Bit
